titles.title: Pipeline Safety Administration Establishment Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish the Pipeline Safety Administration in the Department of Transportation.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: Pipeline Safety Administration Establishment Act - Amends Federal transportation law to establish the Pipeline Safety Administration in the Department of Transportation (DOT), headed by an Administrator appointed by the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
